  • Introduction
  • References

  1. Introduction

    The underlying reason why D3 can draw charts is not magic. D3 just modified the width of a div. And you specify the div's height, width, and color in CSS. Then a chart is generated.

    Chart 

            var data = [100, 200, 300];
        d3.select('.chart').selectAll('div')
            .data(data).enter().append('div').style('width', (d)=>{return d;});

    line-height === div's height make the text center in the middle.

    1. D3 Chart
